body.p: Here are some tools for those who are learning South Saami, or are parents of children who are learning South Saami.

ul.li: OAHPA-åarjel – Interactive programs for training words and grammar
Gïelebaalkan mietie - læringsstier for studenter som lærer seg sørsamisk, men de kan passe for andre også. Lydfiler og linker til øvelser.

Neahttadigisánit – online dictionary. You don't have to downloac it. The dictionary knows also inflected words, and has a Reader Plugin which makes it possible to click at words at Internet, to get them translated.
Gïelese, lær ord med bilder og lyd.
GEO – place names from language to language
